backend/main.mo: Motoko backend storing a list of news items with publish, remove, and query methods using a timestamp field.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries of all major frontend components and pages.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up routing and React Query provider, defining main routes including News.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer displaying logo, credits, and attribution.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Responsive header with desktop and mobile navigation using a sheet menu.
frontend/src/components/ImageSlider.tsx: Image carousel component with autoplay, hover pause, and navigation controls.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Page layout wrapper with header, footer, and routed content outlet.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook creating and managing the authenticated backend actor with access control initialization.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Internet Identity authentication provider and hook handling login, logout, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/pages/NewsPage.tsx: Implements the PIN-gated news management UI, including dialogs for adding and removing news, form validation, and rendering existing news with images.
frontend/src/utils/newsDate.ts: Validates user-entered month/day/year values and converts them into a bigint timestamp in nanoseconds.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters with sessionStorage support and hash/query parsing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugins for the frontend.
project_state.json: Describes the project state, including feature requirements, known issues, and configuration metadata.
